query:
SELECT 
  'clientes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_pesquisaId,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_pesquisaId
FROM clientes
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'mercados_unicos',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM mercados_unicos
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'concorrentes',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM concorrentes
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'leads',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM leads;
